page.title: 07Religion in Stock
page.content: All Saints Church Has an Clock Tower and a Spire the clock chimes every half hour but has no face you can go into the Clock tower.While the War was on the church got hit by a land mine the left wing got Destroyed and had to be rebuilt.They had the organ put in an organ loft and a cross suspended above the entrance to the chancel. They had to close the church now because of vandalism.There was a bell tower with 3 bells which can now only be chimed and not rung_up. There is a cross marking where the Land mine fell.Every summer the church has a Fete.
